column4: Hey guys, i know that i'm probably sol here, but I have a bunch of email saved into a pst file, any ideas on how to import them into evolution?
I know thunderbird can do it.  And I believe there are some converters out there too, most are for windows.  Evolution may be able to import it as well, I haven't tried in ages.
mounting isos doesn't need a program (see the last thing ubottu gave you), and there are a number of fine burning apps (see the previous)
It gives you a fairly recent kernel, but once you install you upgrade to the newest one.
so if i do update mananger does that sort it out for me
Yep, update manager takes care of it
